ExampleDefinition.Description:
This shows the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#SeriesValueModifier.html']SeriesValueModifier[/url] applied to a real-time chart, to display the latest value of a series on the YAxis with an AxisMarkerAnnotation.
[b][i]Tips![/i][/b]
1. By default AxisMarkerAnnotations bind to the Stroke, IsVisible and AxisId properties of the RenderableSeries. You can override the style via the [url='http://www.scichart.com/questions/question/upgrading-to-scicharts-v2']SeriesValueModifier.AxisMarkerStyle[/url] property.
2. The SeriesValueModifier works on a single axis. You can change which axis by setting the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.ChartModifiers.SeriesValueModifier~YAxisId.html']SeriesValueModifier.YAxisId Property[/url]
3. You can include or exlude a series from the SeriesValueModifier by using the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.ChartModifiers.SeriesValueModifier~SetIncludeSeries.html']SeriesValueModifier.IncludeSeries[/url] attached property on the target BaseRenderableSeries.
4. The SeriesValueModifier axis labels obey the output of AxisCore.CursorTextFormatting
